name: Nondurable Goods: not elsewhere classified
tcc: R for face-to-face transactions.\nT for nonâ€“face-to-face transactions.
description:
Wholesale distributors of nondurable goods not elsewhere classified.
The product line of such merchants may include food products, art
and craft goods, clothes hangers, foam rubber, ice, crude rubber,
sponges, textile bags, burlap, canvas products, baskets, gifts and
novelties, leather and cut stock, and other leather goods except
footwear.
For wholesalers that primarily sell leather footwear, use MCC 5139.
For retailers that sell art and craft supplies, use MCC 5970; for
sellers of gifts and novelties, use MCC 5947.
